09-12-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask debuff duration reduced from 7s to 6s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask radius reduced from 7m to 6.5m
- You gain 50% bullet resistance during the 2s ult channel
08-29-2024: - Base movement speed reduced from 6.5 to 6
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate scaling with spirit reduced from 0.375 {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate per Spirit to 0.3
08-15-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word no longer drains 1 stamina
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask cooldown reduced from 16s to 13s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask T2 changed from -10s Cooldown to Drains 1 Stamina
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask T3 now also reduces cooldown by -7s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word immobilize duration reduced from 2s to 1.75
- Binding Word now has a quick cast behavior (same as {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge)
08-01-2024: - Updated Warden {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask impact sounds
- Updated Warden {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word sound mix for teammates
07-18-2024: - Added Warden {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask cast, projectile, and impact sound effects
- Reverted a change from last update to Warden's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask – it now launches where the reticle is aiming at the end of the cast
07-11-2024: - Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: Ivy's Kudzu Bomb, Paradox's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse Grenade, Warden's Alchemical Flask, Vindicta's Stake, Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- Reload time no longer scales with spirit power
- Now innately gains additive fire rate from spirit power (scale factor is 0.015)
06-27-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Willpower|Size=20} Willpower no longer loses movement speed when the shield is depleted
06-20-2024: - Updated reload animations for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden, Dynamo, and Ivy
06-06-2024: - Updated Warden's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word delay and impact sounds
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask T3 increased from +25% Fire Rate Slow to +35%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Willpower|Size=20} Willpower T3 increased from +150 Spirit Shield to +200
05-30-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20} Last Stand duration increased from 5s to 6s
05-23-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask travel speed increased from 800 to 1000
05-16-2024: - Warden's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20} Last Stand has improved visual effects
- New voice for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden (in advance of upcoming model swap)
- Fixed a bug where {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden's second and third abilities were swapped VO wise
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20} Last Stand no longer goes on cooldown when it is interrupted during its initial cast delay
05-10-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask damage increased from 48 to 55
